Key: Oh, Onii-sama! What a freaking coincidence!

Yes! I'm great. How about you, Onii-sama?
You're not hurt at all?

Yeah. I'm fine. Things have been peaceful
lately, I think.

Onii-sama. I take my eyes off you for one
second, and you immediately get yourself
into freaking trouble. Take care of yourself.

Yeah. Thanks a bunch. Mana, you take care
too, okay?

Okay! Oh. Please don't tell Kotori-san that
we bumped into each other here.

(Even in this world, Mana and Kotori's
relationship is strained. I wonder why
she told me to avoid telling Kotori.)

Oh, uh... Nothing. Anyways Mana, do you
want to head to a café and catch up?

With you?! That'd be freaking awesome!
Please...
Oh. Actually, I had plans today.
Got it. I'll see you around.

Okay! I look forward to our next meeting.
Good day, Onii-sama!
